name: Moses H. Cone Memorial Hospital Reviews

review.title: “Great Company”
review.pros: Pros – Generous raises, great people to work for, recognizes accomplishments, easy to move up in the ladder...
review.cons: Cons – Fast paced environment, managers put up with employees who should be fired
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend – I'm optimistic about the outlook for this company

review.title: “Lots of changes”
review.pros: Pros – Nice people to work with
review.cons: Cons – Policies changed often, leading to lots of room for error due to the confusion.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Be more consistent and support workers when they implement new changes.

review.title: “Registered Nurse ICU”
review.pros: Pros – System is growing quickly which provides opportunities. Nice profit sharing program (2% - 5% of annual salary) on top of the 403B match.
review.cons: Cons – Below average pay, dated equipment, punitive environment, below average compensation for area, drama, Drama, and DRAMA.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Realize that management is rarely as effective or as needed as they think they are. Quit spending small fortunes on hiring a never ending stream of new executive and then rehire all the RNs, CNAs & other essential staff your "efficiency company" (a contradiction in terms) decided you (read as your neglected patients and exhausted staff) could do without.
